title: Sion problem
body: During my last game as Sion both the Q and R would not function late game. My ult was first to show issue then my Q. Neither keyboard or mouse function could get them to set off.

replies.body: Happened to me on Hexakill just now, but only my R.  Right before the end of the game, it wouldn't let me cast my ult.  I tried clicking, too.  It didn't appear to be on cooldown.  My W still worked.

This has happened to me multiple times now.  Most frequently Q quits working, just completely.  I have also had R stop on one occasion.  Quitting the game and reconnecting fixes it temporarily, but just tonight I ended up quitting 3 separate times because my Q kept quitting on me.  My observation in the game tonight, it seems like it happens if you get stunned at that right time during charge up of Q.  I have no idea how R gets f'd up though.  

Please fix this Riot, it's hard to play with 1/2 your abilities!

Same thing happened to me.  Was in a Hexakill game and all worked fine until I hit level 6.  Once I hit 6, Q stopped working although I could still type the letter q in chat.  I never got to use my ult (r) at all.  It had the same issue.  I thought it might be tied to a item.  I had boots of swiftness, Black cleaver, and I think armor.  Super annoying.
